thread.title: Mark & Theresa
thread.title_full: R&G Brenner Income Tax reviewed by Mark & Theresa

author: Mark & Theresa
title: Mark & Theresa
text:
The only person that my husband and I trust to complete our taxed is this woman. She is up to the minute on tax laws and continues to perform as a professional.
R&G Brenner should be proud to call her a preparator. We often say how thankful we are that we can come back year after year to a smiling face that knows her stuff. Cheers Eymee
